checkSuperuserPrivilege

public static void checkSuperuserPrivilege(UserGroupInformation owner,
                                           java.lang.String supergroup)
                                    throws AccessControlException
Verify if the caller has the required permission. This will result into an exception if the caller is not allowed to access the resource.

Parameters:
owner - owner of the system
supergroup - supergroup of the system
Throws:
AccessControlException
